title: When people don't get the references in your deliberately cheesy trashtalk

replies.body:
Waitttttt Lucian says, "Ashes and dust!" when he ults. I get it!

I don't think those are the names of his guns though.

When it takes 2 upvotes to counter the 2 downvotes from people who didn't get the statement made in the post about people not getting it.

\*sniffle\*

P.S. Yes I know that's not the name of his guns, but, for the sake of humor, some situations demand a blatant disregard for Occam's razor. Ergo:

* Miss Fortune has two guns.
* Lucian has two guns.
* I just finished saying "How do you like my guns, Shock and Awe."
* Lucian's guns just went ballistic while he yelled "Ashes and Dust".
* Coincidence? I THINK NOT.
